notes.text:
Make the sauces the day before for easier assembly
Don't skimp on the béchamel between layers
Cover with foil if top browns too quickly

steps.descr: Make bolognese: brown beef, add tomatoes, simmer 30 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started with the bolognese! Brown the beef until it's beautifully caramelized, then add the tomatoes. Let it simmer for 30 minutes, giving it a stir now and then.

steps.instructions: Make bolognese: brown beef, add tomatoes, simmer 30 minutes

steps.descr: Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, gradually whisk in milk

on_enter.say: Now, let's make that lovely béchamel sauce. Melt the butter, stir in the flour, and then slowly whisk in the milk until it's smooth and creamy. Keep whisking to avoid lumps!

steps.instructions: Make béchamel: melt butter, add flour, gradually whisk in milk

on_enter.say: Let's get the oven nice and hot. Preheat it to 180°C, or 350°F. Perfect temperature for a golden lasagna!

steps.descr: Layer: meat sauce, pasta, béchamel, repeat

on_enter.say: Time to build our lasagna! Start with a layer of meat sauce, then pasta, then béchamel. Keep layering until you've used everything up. It's like building a delicious pasta tower!

steps.instructions: Layer: meat sauce, pasta, béchamel, repeat

steps.descr: Top with remaining béchamel and all the cheese

on_enter.say: Now for the cheesy finale! Spread the remaining béchamel on top and sprinkle over all that lovely grated cheese. This is what's going to give us that beautiful golden crust.

steps.instructions: Top with remaining béchamel and all the cheese

steps.descr: Bake for 40-45 minutes until golden and bubbling

on_enter.say: Pop the lasagna in the oven and let it bake for 40 to 45 minutes. You'll know it's ready when it's golden and bubbling away. The smell will be irresistible!

steps.instructions: Bake for 40-45 minutes until golden and bubbling

on_enter.say: Fantastic! Let the lasagna rest for 10 minutes before serving. This helps it set a bit so you can slice it beautifully. Almost there!

recipe.title: Classic Lasagna
recipe.description: Layered Italian pasta with rich meat sauce and creamy béchamel
